thread.section_title: Dharma Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very nice and comfortable
thread.title_full: Very nice and comfortable - Review of Dharma Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Andrezanella
title: Very nice and comfortable
text: This is a very well located hotel, it's near Termini station which make easy to come and go by train to other destinations in Italy, if you want to use the Metro is also very easy from the hotel, however Rome is a nice city to walk around, most sightseeing are close to one another. Very much recomend it.
